metadata.description: Fine-tuning dataset for emergency medical triage classification

examples.input: My grandfather collapsed and isn't breathing

expected_output.reasoning: Collapse with no breathing in elderly patient indicates cardiac arrest - immediate CPR and 911 required

examples.input: Someone is choking on food at dinner, turning blue

expected_output.reasoning: Choking with cyanosis (turning blue) indicates complete airway obstruction - immediate Heimlich required

examples.input: I cut my finger chopping vegetables, small amount of blood

expected_output.reasoning: Kitchen cut with minor bleeding can be handled with basic first aid
expected_output.follow_up_question: Is the bleeding stopping with pressure? Can you see how deep the cut is?

examples.input: My friend suddenly can't move their right arm and face is drooping

expected_output.reasoning: Sudden onset of unilateral weakness and facial drooping are classic stroke symptoms - time-critical emergency

examples.input: Child touched hot stove, has red mark on hand

expected_output.reasoning: First-degree burn in child needs cooling and monitoring, escalate to SEVERE if large area or deep
expected_output.follow_up_question: How large is the burned area? Are there any blisters forming?

instructions_for_dataset_generation.step_2: Include variations for age groups (child, adult, elderly)
instructions_for_dataset_generation.step_3: Cover all severity levels proportionally: CRITICAL (20%), SEVERE (30%), MODERATE (30%), MILD (20%)
instructions_for_dataset_generation.step_4: Include edge cases and ambiguous scenarios
instructions_for_dataset_generation.step_6: Include follow-up conversations for MILD cases
instructions_for_dataset_generation.format: JSON Lines (.jsonl) for Gemini fine-tuning API

sample_jsonl_format_for_gemini.description: Each line should be a JSON object with 'contents' field

parts.text: Emergency: My grandfather collapsed and isn't breathing. Age: elderly.

{"emergency_type": "cardiac_arrest", "severity": "CRITICAL", "confidence": 0.95, "requires_sos": true, "requires_helpers": true, "reasoning": "Collapse with no breathing in elderly patient indicates cardiac arrest - immediate CPR and 911 required"}
